alert.note: Alert for Conway (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued October 15 at 6:01PM CDT until October 15 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CONWAY COUNTY... At 600 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Springfield, or 10 miles northeast of Morrilton, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Bethlehem... Solgohachia... Hill Creek... Springfield... Birdtown... Overcup... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
